Home » 40P14 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 37 Saraṇaduka
37.1--6 Paṭiccādivāra
Saraṇaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
52.
169Saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo ca naaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (3)
Saraṇaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
170Araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
Saraṇaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
171Saraṇañca araṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
Saraṇaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
172Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve…pe…  vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate pañca.
  •  Paccanīya
